section: JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: In section 13, under the Member Duties Description for JVLS, LLC, it mentions "$60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions." However, this is not a clear or concise statement of responsibility. It is difficult to understand what exactly are the monetary obligations or responsibilities of JVLS, LLC. The Phrase also seems incomplete or grammatically unsound.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: Under Capital Contributions in section 15, BorrowMoney.com, inc's contribution is listed as "To be determined USD". This is an omission because the contribution is not specifically defined, leading to ambiguity and potential disputes. In the same section, JVLS, LLC has two different USD values. This is an inconsistency because there are two different values, which do not make sense together.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: In the Valuation of Interest section, specifically section 39, the first sentence indicates that in the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. This allows the remaining members to determine the value. The second sentence then states that a withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members. This is ambiguity in text, because the term value is not the same as interest. What will happen if the members decide to use value to determine the amount of interest. It can cause the text to be interpreted multiple ways.
